text.text: Hi there Vrainen! I see you are finally in.
BRUH! I knew this was gonna work!
Now let's move on!
We have tones of work to do...
Your first lesson will be on how to move
the units under your command
First select a unit using left click on
one of them
By the way if you need me to repeat
something or give you some advice
just left click me!
Now that you have selected
one of your units try and
right click an empty tile
Nice! Now you'll need some infantry
to be able to attack and defend
yourself against your enemies!
To do that you'll need resources!
Gatherer's are these tracktor looking
units, they will get resources fro you!
Select that one on screen
Right click on a tree to gather
electricity for the infantry
Notice how on the bottom right
of the screen there is your
electricity reservoir
Get more electricity until you have
15 of them
electricity reservoir
